We are the leading IT consulting company in india having expertise in providing SAAS & SAAP solutions, corporate branding, UI/UX designing, E-commerce and portal development, Android & IOS mobile apps development, and customized ERP software solutions. We encourage innovation and experimentation with fresh ideas, while considering the clients’ requirements at the same time. 

With an experience of more than a decade, we have served more than 500 clients worldwide and have executed more than 800 projects. We have already worked with different brands & served small, medium and large enterprises and empowered them to reach at greater heights. We provide business solutions faster than our competitors and help our clients monetize more effectively. 

Our past work, constant feedback attitude and remarkable success records has set us aside from other IT consulting corporations. We offer end-to-end complete IT solutions that leverages growth of a micro, mini, medium or large enterprises. We believe in empowering every sector with agile digitalization and hence we collaborate with them as a strategic partner and help them to achieve highest performance in their business as a whole. We make sure to leave no stone unturned to ensure client satisfaction & serve them with the best and optimized solutions.
Contact us:info@antsglobe.com
This privacy policy is to inform you regarding the use of your personal information that is collected during your visit to one of our websites. 

We collect information about you when you visit our site, use our services, or view our online advertisements. The information that we collect and store during normal use of the site is use to monitor use of the site and to help further development of our products and services. In general, you can visit our website on the Internet without telling us who you are or providing data that personally identifies you. Such use does not result in any personally identifiable data being collected or stored. We collect and use personal information (including name, address, telephone number and email) to better provide you with the required services, or information. 

We may automatically collect non-personal information about you such as the type of internet browsers you use or the website from which you linked to our website. We may also aggregate details that you have submitted to the site (for example, your age and the town where you live). You cannot be identified from this information and it is only used to assist us in providing an effective service on this web site. We may from time to time supply third parties with this non-personal or aggregated data for uses in connection with this website. 

Privacy Statement
 
Protecting your privacy and ensuring that your personal data is held securely is very important to us. We want you to be confident that we are looking after your interests and that is why we have set out our information practices in this Privacy Statement. We do not share your information with third parties, unless we need to share your information to provide the product or service you have requested and we have asked for and obtained your explicit consent. This Privacy Statement will apply when you use our website to discover more information about us and its products. This Privacy Statement is applicable to data collected by us and other Group companies worldwide for use by these companies. By submitting your Personal Data through this website, you shall be consenting to it being processed in the manner described above by Antsglobe around the world and our hosting organizations around the world. If you have submitted Personal Data through this website and wish us to cease using it for the purposes submitted, please contact us. Changes to This Policy We may edit this policy from time to time. If we make any substantial changes, we may or may not notify you by posting a prominent announcement on our pages.

OUR RETURN POLICY: IT’S REALLY SIMPLE!

(07 Days – No Questions Asked Return Policy) 
The Customer should verify the Product upon its receipt. We assure you of free replacement or repairs in case of any manufacturing defect in the performance of the standard products purchased from us within 07 days of receipt of material at your end.
Resolution in various cases is given below:
If the fault is on us (mixed up, faulty on arrival), we’ll of course pay for return shipping. As soon as the return or exchange has cleared it’s inspection, you will be notified of your exchange or credit immediately.
All requests for returns and order cancellation stands true against the below mentioned clauses.
1.We believe in providing quality merchandise at fair price to our customers.
 
2.Exchange / Returns will made only against a valid receipt.
 
3.Products sourced exclusively on confirmed customer order will not returned / exchanged.
 
4.Warranty/Guarantee will governed by the terms & conditions of the manufacturer with a valid receipt.
 
5.We issue only credit note(s) against the product(s) returned.
 
6.In case of loss of credit note(s), no duplicate will issued.
 
7.Delivery charges and additional octroi charges (if any) are not refundable.
 
8.Management reserves the right to amend terms & conditions without prior notice.
 
9.All credit card transaction disputes have to settle within 48 hours from the date of transaction.
 
10.Warranty will governed by the terms & conditions as mentioned on the Home Delivery challan.
 
11.In the event of any dispute, the same shall be subject to Nagpur Jurisdiction.
How to Return? Kindly raise a return & service request within 07 days of material delivery. Next Steps:
-INFORM US 
-PREPARE PACKAGE 
-SEND THE PACKAGE 
-WE RECEIVE THE PACKAGE 
-REPLACEMENT OR REPAIR WITHIN 7 DAYS
Kindly email our Customer Care team at info@antsglobe.com or call our Support Number at 022-48808549, if case of any questions or queries for timely resolution.

Kindly email our Customer Care team at info@antsglobe.com or call our Support Number at 022-48808549, if case of any questions or queries for timely resolution.
We aim to deliver the products you purchase as fast as possible and in the most brilliant condition. Our business days are Monday through Friday; we do not process orders on Saturday, Sunday, or major Indian Holidays.
General Shipping Information
1) We make our best efforts to ship each item in your order within 4-5 working days of the order. However, in some cases, we may take longer, up to 7-10 working days, to ship the product. Once we ship the item(s), you will receive another email containing the shipping details. You will also be able to view your order status and tracking numbers in your account order history.
2)We process all deliveries through reputed couriers. Once your order is shipped you will be provided with a tracking number that you can use to track your delivery on the logistic company’s website.
3) While it is our endeavour to ship all items in your order together; this may not always be possible due to product characteristics or availability. Please be aware that your order may be dispatched in separate parcels from different locations and on different dates.
4) Our courier partner makes attempts to reach you via a phone call or SMS. Please ensure that you take calls from our courier partner to facilitate delivery of your package. A second attempt will automatically be made within 24 hours. After the second attempt, our courier will hold on to the parcel for 3 days awaiting further instructions from the recipient before returning the parcel to Antsglobe Technologies LLP.
5) Once the parcel has been shipped back to us by the courier partner, we will automatically cancel that order. The payment made by you towards the cancelled order will be refunded via the original mode of payment.
6) If when you receive your parcel you notice that it is damaged, you should refuse to accept it. All parcels are guaranteed to be in perfect condition when they are dispatched from our partner centres. If you refuse your parcel, please contact Customer Care 9021-779-995. You can also email us at info@antsglobe.com
7) Please note, there are no extra taxes, hidden costs or additional shipping charges. The price mentioned on the website is the final price. All taxes are included with the listed product prices.
8) If an order gets cancelled, undelivered or is lost in route to your preferred destination, we will refund the whole order amount comprising of shipping charges.
9) In case you cancel a portion of your order, the shipping charges will not be refunded.
10) In case you return the delivered order, the original charges of shipping won’t be refunded.

We reserve the right at any time to modify or discontinue the Service (or any part or content thereof) without notice at any time. These products or services may have limited quantities and are subject to return or exchange only according to our Return Policy. We cannot guarantee that your computer monitor's display of any colour will be accurate. Any offer for any product or service made on this site is void where prohibited. We do not warrant that the quality of any products, services, information, or other material purchased or obtained by you will meet your expectations, or that any errors in the Service will be corrected.
7.GENERAL CONDITIONS: We reserve the right to refuse service to anyone for any reason at any time. You understand that your content (not including credit card information), may be transferred unencrypted and involve (a) transmissions over various networks; and (b) changes to conform and adapt to technical requirements of connecting networks or devices. Credit card information is always encrypted during transfer over networks. You agree not to reproduce, duplicate, copy, sell, resell or exploit any portion of the Service, use of the Service, or access to the Service or any contact on the website through which the service is provided, without express written permission by us.
